title: Update Economic Empowerment locations to India, Jharkhand

requirements.summary: Replace the Economic Empowerment program “Locations Served” text with “India, Jharkhand” anywhere it is displayed on the site.
acceptanceCriteria: On /programs, the Economic Empowerment program card shows "Locations Served" as exactly: "India, Jharkhand".
The previous locations text "Cambodia, Myanmar, Bolivia, Nicaragua" is no longer displayed anywhere on the site.

file_operations.description: Update the Economic Empowerment program's `locations` value from "Cambodia, Myanmar, Bolivia, Nicaragua" to exactly "India, Jharkhand", ensuring the old locations string is fully removed from this page so it cannot appear in the UI.
